meanings.definition: The quality or state of being blue.
meanings.sent1: The blueness of the ocean was so calming.
meanings.sent2: I love the blueness of the sky on a sunny day.
meanings.sent3: Her room was painted with such a bright blueness, it made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The blueness of his eyes was like looking into the deep sea.
meanings.sent5: The blueness of the forget-me-not flowers was truly enchanting.

meanings.definition: The color of the sky on a clear day.
meanings.sent1: The blueness of the sky was a perfect backdrop for the fluffy clouds.
meanings.sent2: We had a picnic under the beautiful blueness of the sky.
meanings.sent3: The blueness of the sky matched the color of his favorite hat.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the blueness of the sky at noon.
meanings.sent5: The blueness of the sky seemed to stretch on forever.

meanings.definition: A feeling of sadness or melancholy.
meanings.sent1: She couldn't shake off the blueness that lingered after watching the sad movie.
meanings.sent2: The blueness in his voice told me he was feeling down.
meanings.sent3: Despite the blueness in the air, she tried to cheer everyone up with a joke.
meanings.sent4: The blueness in her eyes mirrored the gloomy weather outside.
meanings.sent5: The blueness of the rainy day matched her somber mood.
